sources said David Cameron gathered a few colleagues together to show his continuing support for Andy Coulson . No 10 is expected to organise a proper leaving party, which will be attended by David Cameron . One source said: It was not a big leaving do. It was a quiet goodbye with the prime minister. There will be a night out with Andy Coulson when colleagues can give him a present.
